title: Software Development Engineer Intern, Amazon
bullets: Developed LTMToolkit, a web service to diagnose, investigate and fix issues in Amazon's Enterprise Translation Orchestration systems, increasing productivity by 200%.

title: Teaching Assistant, University of Washington Information School
bullets: Wrote a 90-minute introductory AI and Machine Learning lecture, shown to over 1,200 students.

title: President, Society of Asian Scientists and Engineers @ UW
bullets: Led the organization of networking events with Google, Amazon, Microsoft and Blue Origin for the benefit of AAPI student community at UW, with over 200 historical attendees.
